metadata.description: The early days of the 31st century are a Golden Age for the galaxy as poverty, famine, war, and disease have become relics of the past. The Dawning Millennium is utopian: shining, optimistic, bright…and deadly dull. That is until a bright, defiant, energized team of super-powered teenagers from different worlds is assembled! Welcome the Legion of Super-Heroes!
metadata.name: Legion of Super-Heroes
